snippet: Mareike Wegener’s documentary, “Mark Lombardi: Death-Defying Acts of Art and Conspiracy,” examines the Conceptualist artist whose work delineated the networks of money and power.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews Mareike Wegener's documentary film Mark Lombardi: Death-Defying Acts of Art and Conspiracy.
lead_paragraph: Mareike Wegener’s documentary, “Mark Lombardi: Death-Defying Acts of Art and Conspiracy,” examines the Conceptualist artist whose work delineated the networks of money and power.

headline.main: An Artist Who Delineated the Money
headline.print_headline: An Artist Who Delineated the Money
